artist: Maker: Unknown; Publisher: Knust Press, Nijmegen, Netherlands
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Two folded leaves glued together at the spine, with letterpress and color offset lithographic designs and illustrations printed on wove paper. The two leaves each fold out to display a series of comic scenes (recto) and a geometric pattern (verso.)
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; folded leaves
title: Media Boloney Knust Wallpaper
